com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.tools

Class RegroupInstances

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.design.tools.RegroupInstances

  • public class RegroupInstances
extends Object
    Regroups (or refactor) a set of instances in a design or netlist such that each instance is logically re-located to a new parent in the hierarchy of the netlist.

    • Constructor Summary

      static void regroupInstances(Design design, Map<String,String> regroupMappings)
      Regroups the design/netlist hierarchy according to the provided map which specifies instances to regroup to a new parent name and maintains logical connectivity.

    • Constructor Detail

        public RegroupInstances()

    • Method Detail

      • regroupInstances

        public static void regroupInstances(Design design,
                                    Map<String,String> regroupMappings)
        Regroups the design/netlist hierarchy according to the provided map which specifies instances to regroup to a new parent name and maintains logical connectivity. Note the design must be unplaced to perform this operation.
        Parameters:
        design - The current design to operate on
        regroupMappings - A map of regroup mappings where the key is the full hierarchical instance name to regroup and the value is the full hierarchical instance name of the new parent of the instance.

      • parseRegroupMappingsFile

        public static Map<String,String> parseRegroupMappingsFile(String fileName)

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
